Schema: {"typeName":"Dynatrace::Configuration::Dashboard","description":"Manage a dashboard in Dynatrace.","sourceUrl":"https://github.com/aws-ia/cloudformation-dynatrace-resource-providers.git","documentationUrl":"https://github.com/aws-ia/cloudformation-dynatrace-resource-providers","definitions":{"DynatraceAccess":{"type":"object","properties":{"Token":{"description":"Personal Access Token","type":"string"},"Endpoint":{"description":"Endpoint URL to access Dynatrace API","type":"string"}},"required":["Token","Endpoint"],"additionalProperties":false},"Metadata":{"description":"Metadata useful for debugging.","type":"object","properties":{"ConfigurationVersions":{"description":"A sorted list of the version numbers of the configuration.","type":"array","uniqueItems":false,"insertionOrder":false,"items":{"type":"integer"}},"ClusterVersion":{"description":"Dynatrace version.","type":"string"}},"additionalProperties":false},"DashboardMetadata":{"description":"Parameters of a dashboard.","type":"object","properties":{"Name":{"description":"The name of the dashboard.","type":"string","minLength":1},"Shared":{"description":"The dashboard is shared (true) or private (false).","type":"boolean"},"Owner":{"description":"The owner of the dashboard.","type":"string"},"DashboardFilter":{"$ref":"#/definitions/DashboardFilter"},"Tags":{"description":"A set of tags assigned to the dashboard.","type":"array","uniqueItems":true,"insertionOrder":false,"items":{"type":"string"}},"Preset":{"description":"The dashboard is a preset (true) or a custom (false) dashboard.","type":"boolean"},"DynamicFilters":{"$ref":"#/definitions/DynamicFilters"},"TilesNameSize":{"description":"The general size of the tiles tile. Default value is medium","type":"string","enum":["small","medium","large"],"default":"medium"}},"required":["Name","Owner"],"additionalProperties":false},"DashboardFilter":{"description":"Filters, applied to a dashboard.","type":"object","properties":{"Timeframe":{"description":"The default timeframe of the dashboard.","type":"string"},"ManagementZone":{"$ref":"#/definitions/EntityShortRepresentation"}},"additionalProperties":false},"EntityShortRepresentation":{"description":"The short representation of a Dynatrace entity.","type":"object","properties":{"Id":{"description":"The ID of the Dynatrace entity.","type":"string"},"Name":{"description":"The name of the Dynatrace entity.","type":"string"}},"additionalProperties":false},"DynamicFilters":{"description":"Dashboard filter configuration of a dashboard.","type":"object","properties":{"Filters":{"description":"A set of all possible global dashboard filters that can be applied to a dashboard.","type":"array","uniqueItems":true,"insertionOrder":false,"items":{"type":"string"}}},"required":["Filters"],"additionalProperties":false},"Tiles":{"description":"The list of tiles on the dashboard.","type":"array","uniqueItems":false,"insertionOrder":true,"items":{"$ref":"#/definitions/Tile"}},"Id":{"description":"The ID of the dashboard.","type":"string"},"Tile":{"description":"Configuration of a tile.\n\nThe actual set of fields depends on the type of the tile. Find the list of actual objects in the description of the tileType field or see Dashboards API - Tile JSON models (https://dt-url.net/2wc3spx).","type":"object","properties":{"Name":{"type":"string"},"TileType":{"type":"string"},"Bounds":{"type":"object","properties":{"Width":{"type":"number"},"Top":{"type":"number"},"Left":{"type":"number"},"Height":{"type":"number"}},"additionalProperties":false},"Configured":{"type":"boolean"},"TileFilter":{"$ref":"#/definitions/DashboardFilter"}},"additionalProperties":false}},"typeConfiguration":{"properties":{"DynatraceAccess":{"$ref":"#/definitions/DynatraceAccess"}},"additionalProperties":false,"required":["DynatraceAccess"]},"properties":{"Metadata":{"$ref":"#/definitions/Metadata"},"DashboardMetadata":{"$ref":"#/definitions/DashboardMetadata"},"Tiles":{"$ref":"#/definitions/Tiles"},"Id":{"$ref":"#/definitions/Id"}},"additionalProperties":false,"tagging":{"taggable":false},"required":["DashboardMetadata","Tiles"],"readOnlyProperties":["/properties/Id","/properties/Metadata/ClusterVersion"],"writeOnlyProperties":["/properties/DashboardMetadata/Preset"],"primaryIdentifier":["/properties/Id"],"handlers":{"create":{"permissions":[]},"read":{"permissions":[]},"update":{"permissions":[]},"delete":{"permissions":[]},"list":{"permissions":[]}}}
